content: प्रतप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To be hot, burn, glow. {@--2@} To heat. {@--3@} To kindle, illumine. {@--4@} To bake, roast. {@--5@} To feel pain, suffer. {@--6@} To mortify the body, undergo penance. {@--7@} To pain, distress, torment. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To warm, heat. {@--2@} To set on fire, irradiate. {@--3@} To torment, pain, distress.
